description: As I arrived at Zack's place to pay him a surprise visit, I saw him on his new motor bike. He was hotter than ever. Looking at the semi-private surrounding, I asked him if he would mind doing a shoot outside, on his bike. He looked around, saw a couple of people walking, then started to get hard just thinking that he could get caught. So that was it, he agreed and started to strip. This was my first scene shot outside and I really loved it. The sun on Zack's ripped body made so many beautiful shots as he kept making sure that his neighbors didn't see him. A very exciting scene with one of Maskurbate's most popular models! Stay tuned as Zack welcomes us inside his new home...
title: Motor Bike Cum
